message:
It has special code to allow it to read the contents of a URL you provide - it still knows a lot without the URL, but you're quite right, I think, in that it kinda just uses its training data set to determine if it knows a character otherwise. Thanks! I'll probably refine it further in that case!

Also, here's a slightly updated link, in case anybody is interested (it still has the wikipedia/Fandom blurb for the moment, but I'll get around to it shorty ☺️)

perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Refined_Character_Creator~f6ed69d4fbdccb5fb632786be108677b.gz
